Steps To Reproduce:
You can reproduce it with Demo App

I've tested it in firefox:
1. Call demo url: http://localhost:1080/rap
2. In the same tab, Go to another web site, i.e: www.eclipse.org
3. Come back to Demo App url

Now appears a white page, if you try to refresh then It appears an Error 500 on screen and an exception is shown on console.


More information:
I've just updated projects from CVS, 20 minutes ago.

There is another problem that I suposse that is related with this.

Simply when you close workbench and then refresh page to entry again into application, An exception is thrown:
